metadata.title: CVE-2014-9474 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the mpfr_strtofr function in GNU MPFR before 3.1.2-p11 allows context-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to incorrect documentation for mpn_set_str.

criterions.comment: mpfr4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-2').
